align.type: AlignmentOptionType | Partial<Record<Breakpoint, AlignmentOptionType | [AlignmentOptionType | undefined, AlignmentOptionType | undefined] | undefined>> | [...]

autoplay.description: If `true`, the carousel will be autoplay.

colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

containScroll.type: ScrollContainOptionType | Partial<Record<Breakpoint, ScrollContainOptionType | [ScrollContainOptionType | undefined, ScrollContainOptionType | undefined] | undefined>> | [...]
containScroll.description:
Clear leading and trailing empty space that causes excessive scrolling.
Use trimSnaps to only use snap points that trigger scrolling or keepSnaps to keep them.

controlNextProps.description: Props for next of the carousel control element.

controlPrevProps.description: Props for previous of the carousel control element.

controlRef.description: Ref of the resizable item callback.

defaultIndex.description: The initial index of the carousel slide.

delay.description: The number for the autoplay interval of the carousel.

dragFree.description: If `true`, momentum scrolling will be enabled.

draggable.description: If `true`, carousel can be scrolled with mouse and touch interactions.

duration.description:
Set scroll duration when triggered by any of the API methods.
Higher numbers enables slower scrolling.
Drag interactions are not affected because duration is then determined by the drag force.

includeGapInSize.description: If `true`, gap will be treated as part of the carousel slide size.

index.description: The index of the carousel slide.

inViewThreshold.type: number | number[] | Partial<Record<Breakpoint, number | number[] | [number | number[] | undefined, number | number[] | undefined] | undefined>> | [...]
inViewThreshold.description: Choose a fraction representing the percentage portion of a slide that needs to be visible in order to be considered in view.

loop.description:
If `true`, infinite looping.
Automatically falls back to false if slide content isn't enough to loop.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when carousel slide selected.

onScrollProgress.description: A callback that return the current scroll amount when the carousel is scrolled.

skipSnaps.description:
If `true`, allow the carousel to skip scroll snaps if it's dragged vigorously.
Note that this option will be ignored if the dragFree option is set to true.

slidesToScroll.description: The number of slides that should be scrolled with next or previous buttons.

stopMouseEnterAutoplay.description: If `true`, autoplay will pause when the mouse entries over.

watchDrag.description:
Enables for scrolling the carousel with mouse and touch interactions.
Set this to `false` to disable drag events or pass a custom callback to add your own drag logic.

watchResize.description:
Embla automatically watches the container and slides for size changes and runs `reInit` when any size has changed.
Set this to `false` to disable this behaviour or pass a custom callback to add your own resize logic.

watchSlides.description:
Embla automatically watches the container for added and/or removed slides and runs `reInit` if needed.
Set this to `false` to disable this behaviour or pass a custom callback to add your own slides changed logic.

withControls.description: If `true`, display the carousel control buttons.

withIndicators.description: If `true`, display the carousel indicator buttons.

disableRipple.description: If `true`, disable ripple effects when pressing a element.

icon.description: The icon to be used in the button.

isActive.description: If `true`, the button is represented as active.

isLoading.description: If `true`, the loading state of the button is represented.

isRounded.description: If true, the button is full rounded. Else, it'll be slightly round.

component.description: The custom carousel indicator to use.
